column4: For Apple Macintosh G3, G4, and G5 computers, including iBooks and PowerBooks as well as IBM OpenPower machines.
the main pc only mentions G4 and G5
probably a typo, G3 support is practically free when you have G4 support
dunno about that VLOS based on gentoo said it supported only G4 and G5 and it meant it ! it refused to boot on my G3
